subject: Wages and Salaries
Football
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. salary cap for 2012 is $120.6 million, $225,000 above last year’s figure. All teams must be under the cap by Tuesday, when free agency begins.
snippet: The N.F.L. salary cap for 2012 is $120.6 million, $225,000 above last year’s figure. All teams must be under the cap by Tuesday, when free agency begins.
